titleStmt.title: The famous history of the valiant London-prentice shewing his noble exploits at home and abroad: his love and great success. Very pleasant and delightful. Written for encouragement of youth. By J.S. This may be printed, R.P.
titleStmt.author: J. S.
J. S. (John Shirley), fl. 1680-1702, attributed name.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for J. Back, at the Black-Boy on the middle of London-Bridge,

notesStmt.note: Text is virtually the same as The famous history of Aurelius, the valiant London-prentice by John Shirley.
Reproduction of the original in the Guildhall Library, London.

place.placeName: the Black-Boy on the middle of London-Bridge
